participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, Evelyn often finds herself pondering deep questions about life and the universe.
participant_1.background: She grew up in a small town, where her love for books and storytelling blossomed.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Marcus loves exploring new ideas and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: Having traveled extensively for work, he brings a wealth of experiences from different cultures.
